name: pnp-list-all-sites-with-app-installed
title: List SharePoint sites where the particular app is installed
shortDescription: This script will retrieve all sites in SharePoint where a particular app is installed.
longDescription: This script will retrieve all sites in SharePoint where a particular app is installed.
